channel.title: CVE Feed for Squirrly -- SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Squirrly -- SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO

item.title: CVE-2024-43286|2024-08-19T15:24:48.236Z -- squirrly -- seo%20plugin%20by%20squirrly%20seo
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Squirrly SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO.This issue affects SEO Plugin by Squirrly SEO: from n/a through 12.3.19.
